sensitivity: We recommend Colgate Sensitive Plus toothpaste. It helps soothe sensitivity and protect enamel.
cavity: Try Colgate Strong Teeth. It strengthens your teeth and protects against cavities.
gum: For gum health, we suggest Colgate Total Gum Health. It fights gum problems and keeps your gums healthy.
whitening: Use Colgate Visible White to brighten your smile and remove surface stains.
freshBreath: Colgate MaxFresh is perfect for fresh breath, with its cooling crystals that keep your mouth fresh for hours.
